genbuShrine.description: A grand statue of a turtle Genbu, guardian god of the north stands before you.
genbuShrine.tokenDescription: You take out the Turtle token and place it in an inlet at the base of the statue. The statue briefly glows with spiritual radiance.
genbuShrine.wrongTokenDescription: You place the token in the inlet at the base of the statue. The statue does not react.

minamotoResidence.itemDescription: Minamoto no Hiromasa hands you the legenday sword of Susanoo. You accept it reverently. He asks you to use this sword as the focus of the ritual
minamotoResidence.description: You have arrived at the main residence of the Minamoto family in the city. A representative bades you enter to meet the lord of the residence, Minamoto no Hiromasa.

seiryuuShrine.description: A grand statue of the great dragon Seiryuu, guardian god of the east stands before you.
seiryuuShrine.tokenDescription: You take out the Dragon token and place it in an inlet at the base of the statue. The statue briefly glows with spiritual radiance.
seiryuuShrine.wrongTokenDescription: You place the token in the inlet at the base of the statue. The statue does not react.

murasakiResidence.startDescription: Madam Murasaki finishes explaning your objectives and sends you on your way. She reminds you that the great serpent is likely in the palace in the center of the city.
murasakiResidence.description: You have arrived a the main residence of the great poet Murasaki Shikubu.

suzakuShrine.description: A grand statue of the magestic bird, Suzaku, guardian god of the south stands before you.
suzakuShrine.tokenDescription: You take out the Bird token and place it in an inlet at the base of the statue. The statue briefly glows with spiritual radiance.
suzakuShrine.wrongTokenDescription: You place the token in the inlet at the base of the statue. The statue does not react.

abeResidence.itemDescription: The great Abe no Seimei himself hands you his manuscript on how to perform the ritual to reseal the great serpent
abeResidence.description: You have arrived at the main residence of Abe no Seimei, the onmyoji master. A representative bades you enter to meet the lord of the residence.

byakkoShrine.description: A grand statue of the grand tiger, Byakko, guardian god of the west stands before you.
byakkoShrine.tokenDescription: You take out the Tiger token and place it in an inlet at the base of the statue. The statue briefly glows with spiritual radiance.
byakkoShrine.wrongTokenDescription: You place the token in the inlet at the base of the statue. The statue does not react.

fujiwaraResidence.itemDescription: The servent at the gate hands you a Ofuda Talisman imbued with protections that will help you fight the serpent
fujiwaraResidence.description: You have arrived a the main residence of the Fujiwara family in the city.

grandPalace.description: You pass the palace gates and walk toward the grand hall when the a lone figure approaches you. As the figure approaches, their form begins to twist and warp. The great serpent is front of you! Are you prepared?
